ideas.name: Double tap to edit
ideas.body: Change the title above to modify what you see in the overview!  Changes here will not be displayed in the overview, but will remain here for you to check later!

ideas.name: Sweet Idea
ideas.body: An idea is a great thing. We don't want to see your ideas go to waste; this is why we create the Ideorbit app, which will help you remember all of your great ideas in an intuitive fashion.
